snippet: Kering, the conglomerate that is home to brands including Alexander McQueen and Balenciaga, announced on Friday that it had taken a minority stake in the label started by the French-American designer Joseph Altuzarra.
abstract: Kering, the conglomerate that is home to brands including Alexander McQueen and Balenciaga, announced on Friday that it had taken a minority stake in the label started by the French-American designer Joseph Altuzarra.

headline.main: Kering Takes Minority Stake in Altuzarra Fashion Label
